data.actual_result: There's an error popup related to regular file uploads
data.expected_result: It should be the regular error
data.short_description: When uploading a PNG/GIF over 50 mb as emoji or server icon/avatar you get the error popup related to regular file uploads
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a gif or png file which size is over 50mb (I attached the file I used) - Go to user settings and try to upload the file as your avatar - Go to server settings and try to upload the file server icon then as emoji
